alternativeNames: Vasileva, A.N.; Vassiljeva, A.N.; Vassilieva, A.N.
examples: Leiospora (C.A.Mey.) A.N.Vassiljeva in Bot. Mater. Gerb. Bot. Inst. Bot. Acad. Nauk Kazakhsk. S.S.R. vi. 28 (1969).
source: IK; from Geltman 1990; Lifespan and forenames from: The study of the botanical diversity of Kazakhstan at the present stage: Proceedings of the International Scientific Conference dedicated to the anniversaries of outstanding botanists of Kazakhstan. 218c: 37. 2013.
